response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand its worth to you is $15,000. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $14,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring you receive a high-quality solution while allowing me to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 14000}
